Items.Name: <color=grey>None</color>
Items.FlavorText: There's nothing here.

Items.Name: Arrow
Items.FlavorText: Ammunition for a bow.

Items.Name: Bolt
Items.FlavorText: Ammunition for a crossbow.

Items.Name: Bullet
Items.FlavorText: Ammunition for a firearm.

Items.Name: Plasma Cell
Items.FlavorText: Ammunition for a plasma firearm.

Items.Name: Seed
Items.FlavorText: A natural projectile.

Items.Name: Brass Knuckles
Items.FlavorText: Add a little punch to your punch with this back-alley weapon.

Items.Name: Fist Fillers
Items.FlavorText: Weights that, when held, add substatial impact to punches.

Items.Name: Caestus
Items.FlavorText: Weighted leather wrappings fixed with iron studs. These gloves can cause considerable damage in the right hands.

Items.Name: Shock Glove
Items.FlavorText: A metal glove fixed with a solar battery pack. It will send an electrical current through anything unlucky enough to be on the bad end.

Items.Name: Drill Fist
Items.FlavorText: A large segmented arm piece with a large drill at the end. Often used in industrial mining work.

Items.Name: Wood Plank
Items.FlavorText: A crude blunt weapon, made of a rotting 2x4 plank.

Items.Name: Femur
Items.FlavorText: The femur of some creature, repurposed into a crude club.

Items.Name: Club
Items.FlavorText: Nothing but a thick branch, but it will crush skulls nonetheless.

Items.Name: Spiked Branch
Items.FlavorText: A weak branch with several nails protruding through its surface.

Items.Name: Hammer
Items.FlavorText: A tool often used to bludgeon nails into wood.

Items.Name: Chains
Items.FlavorText: A strand of chains that can be repurposed as a whip of sorts.

Items.Name: Barbed Bat
Items.FlavorText: A makeshift baseball bat with barbed wire wrapped around its length.

Items.Name: Crowbar
Items.FlavorText: Not made to be a weapon, but this rod of steel can deal devastating blows in the right hands.

Items.Name: Night Stick
Items.FlavorText: A smuggled policing weapon. It is retractable and portable.

Items.Name: Stun Baton
Items.FlavorText: An Ensis-designed baton. It has electricity coursing down its length, allowing the user to stun opponents.

Items.Name: Steel Mace
Items.FlavorText: A bludgeoning weapon made of steel.

Items.Name: Pneumatic Hammer
Items.FlavorText: A large hammer with a pneumatic head. It is often used in heavy industrial work.

Items.Name: Sledgehammer
Items.FlavorText: A large two-handed hammer. Leave nothing recognizable of your foes behind.

Items.Name: Dagger
Items.FlavorText: A simple blade. The choice for assassins and jealous lovers alike.

Items.Name: Bone Saw
Items.FlavorText: A steel serrated saw, used during surgery to cut through bones.

Items.Name: Scalpel
Items.FlavorText: A tool used by surgeons to cut into flesh.

Items.Name: Stiletto
Items.FlavorText: Quick and silent, like a shadow. It is capable of striking multiple times in sucession.

Items.Name: Rusty Spike
Items.FlavorText: What appears to be an old railroad spike. Its surface doesn't look sanitary at all.

Items.Name: Rapier
Items.FlavorText: Most commonly used by nobles, and for dueling purposes. A fast but flimsy weapon.

Items.Name: Kopesh
Items.FlavorText: A small, curved sickle-sword based on an ancient Egyptian design.

Items.Name: Short Sword
Items.FlavorText: A deadly and easy to use blade of steel. Tried and true.

Items.Name: Bastard Sword
Items.FlavorText: A hand-and-a-half sword, sporting a wicked edge. A must-have for blade aficionados.

Items.Name: Katana
Items.FlavorText: A curved, single-bladed sword based on an ancient design. It has a wicked edge, but is also fragile.

Items.Name: Greatsword
Items.FlavorText: A gigantic blade. It requires two hands, and even then is still difficult to use.

Items.Name: Staff
Items.FlavorText: A long pole used for bashing foes from a distance.

Items.Name: Pitchfork
Items.FlavorText: Often used to move hay. Can be repurposed into a weapon if the need arises. The ancestor of the Trident.

Items.Name: Spear
Items.FlavorText: Its reach alone offers you great boons during battle.

Items.Name: Trident
Items.FlavorText: Originating as a fishing tool, this three-pronged spear can be deadly in the right hands.

Items.Name: Halberd
Items.FlavorText: A long polearm with a large axe head on the end.

Items.Name: Lance
Items.FlavorText: Lances were made as mounted weapons. Few have made use of lances in on-foot combat.

Items.Name: Hatchet
Items.FlavorText: A small axe, better suited to cutting kindling than flesh.

Items.Name: Axe
Items.FlavorText: A woodcutter's axe. Burying this in your enemies is sure to leave a lasting mark.

Items.Name: Battle Axe
Items.FlavorText: A double-bladed axe, able to cleave bodies in two.

Items.Name: Scythe
Items.FlavorText: In the right hands, this tool can be used as a wicked death-dealer. Reap the crop of heads.

Items.Name: Eversight Axe
Items.FlavorText: An axe wielded by the assassin group, The Eversight.

Items.Name: Short Bow
Items.FlavorText: A small bow made of wood. It has straps of leather to add some comfort to the wielder.

Items.Name: Crossbow
Items.FlavorText: A horizontal bow mounted on a firearm-like frame. It fires bolts at high speed.

Items.Name: Pistol
Items.FlavorText: A small, handheld firearm.

Items.Name: Smart Pistol
Items.FlavorText: An auto-targeting pistol.

Items.Name: Hunting Rifle
Items.FlavorText: A sleek bolt-action rifle, suitable for long-ranged kills.

Items.Name: Sniper Rifle
Items.FlavorText: A rife with a long barrel and scope, designed to pick off targets from afar.

Items.Name: Assault Rifle
Items.FlavorText: A rifle commonly used in warfare. It fires a three-round burst.

Items.Name: Shotgun
Items.FlavorText: A pump action shotgun. Fires buckshot rounds in a spread.

Items.Name: Plasma Rifle
Items.FlavorText: A semi-automatic rifle that shoots plasma rounds.

Items.Name: Throwing Knife
Items.FlavorText: A light, balanced dagger with no hilt. It is used for launching at foes from a distance.

Items.Name: Throwing Axe
Items.FlavorText: A small projectile axe.

Items.Name: Javelin
Items.FlavorText: A light spear that is made to be thrown. It is very aerodynamic, and can pierce armor effectively.

Items.Name: Pickaxe
Items.FlavorText: This tool can puncture through stone and flesh alike.

Items.Name: Shovel
Items.FlavorText: A slow digging tool that can be brandished as a weapon in dire times

Items.Name: Plywood Shield
Items.FlavorText: A piece of plywood crudely made into a small shield.

Items.Name: Buckler
Items.FlavorText: A small, rounded shield made of metal used to deflect incoming blows.

Items.Name: Lantern Shield
Items.FlavorText: A shield  worn like a glove, with a protective metal plate along the wrist. A light is placed in the center.

Items.Name: Frostborne Shield
Items.FlavorText: A cold-repelling shield often held by Frostborne who are not yet used to the Northern environment.

Items.Name: Riot Shield
Items.FlavorText: A large plate shield with a plexiglass window at the top.

Items.Name: Energy Shield
Items.FlavorText: A barrier made almost exclusively of energy, worn like a glove on the left hand. It protects against attacks extremely well.

Items.Name: Main Gauche
Items.FlavorText: A small parrying dagger. Often used to disarm opponents.

Items.Name: Sai
Items.FlavorText: A three-pronged parrying dagger designed to tear blades from opponents' hands.

Items.Name: Torch
Items.FlavorText: A necessity for traveling into the depths of Axu. Torches grant you more visibility in darkness.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Lucent</color> Prism
Items.FlavorText: A translucent prism, made of an unknown material. It exumes light in a wide radius.

Items.Name: Orb of <color=magenta>Thought</color>
Items.FlavorText: A shimmering orb that allows the wielder's mind to think with more clarity.

Items.Name: Orb of <color=cyan>Cooling</color>
Items.FlavorText: A shimmering orb that expells a cooling aura, negating a large potion of <color=orange>heat</color> damage taken by the wielder.

Items.Name: Skull Mask
Items.FlavorText: These masks are worn by the Skull Bandit tribe of Axu. A symbol of ferocity.

Items.Name: Leather Hood
Items.FlavorText: Protects the wearer from hard dust storms and rainy days.

Items.Name: Miner's Helmet
Items.FlavorText: A simple helmet with a fixed light.

Items.Name: Infantry Helmet
Items.FlavorText: A repurposed military helmet. It is dented but servicable.

Items.Name: Steel Helmet
Items.FlavorText: A replica dark-age helmet made of steel. Heavy and encumbering, but it protects very well.

Items.Name: Horned Helmet
Items.FlavorText: A steel helmet with long horns on top.

Items.Name: Spotter
Items.FlavorText: A headband with a screen covering one eye. It increases accuracy with melee and ranged weapons.

Items.Name: Shining Circlet
Items.FlavorText: A circlet adorned with various gems. Wearing it seems to cause your brain to function more effectively.

Items.Name: Woven Bracelet
Items.FlavorText: A cloth bracelet, sporting a colourful pattern.

Items.Name: Wool Glove
Items.FlavorText: A glove made of wool. Offers little protection.

Items.Name: Oven Mitt
Items.FlavorText: Offers little protection and will encumber your hands, but will stave off heat.

Items.Name: Falconer Glove
Items.FlavorText: A falconer glove, used to protecting against sharp falcon talons.

Items.Name: Gauntlet
Items.FlavorText: A steel gauntlet that can deflect blows. It is heavy.

Items.Name: Spiked Glove
Items.FlavorText: A leather glove with spikes along the knuckles.

Items.Name: Shimmering Gauntlet
Items.FlavorText: A gauntlet made of a material similar to silk. Your hand feels more nimble. A low light emenates from them.

Items.Name: Sandal
Items.FlavorText: A flimsy piece of footwear providing little to no protection. Don't put on socks while wearing these.

Items.Name: Hiking Shoe
Items.FlavorText: Typical gear worn for long hikes.

Items.Name: Durafoam Shoe
Items.FlavorText: A shoe with a special sole that inhibits sounds made by the wearer.

Items.Name: Leather Boot
Items.FlavorText: A sturdy, though worn, boot.

Items.Name: Snow Boot
Items.FlavorText: A sturdy, though worn, boot. It provides protection against the cold.

Items.Name: Rubber Boot
Items.FlavorText: A rubber-soled boot.

Items.Name: Sabaton
Items.FlavorText: An armored shoe. Very encumbering and inflexible.

Items.Name: Plain Shirt
Items.FlavorText: A basic white t-shirt. Provides no protection.

Items.Name: Enviro Suit
Items.FlavorText: A bulky and uncomfortable suit that protects the wearer from excessive heat, but little else.

Items.Name: Duster
Items.FlavorText: A long, fashionable jacket made of leather.

Items.Name: Winter Jacket
Items.FlavorText: A jacket made for harsh winters. Will keep you insulated against the cold.

Items.Name: Padded Vest
Items.FlavorText: A thick vest, providing protection to the torso. Protects against the heat.

Items.Name: Boiled Leather
Items.FlavorText: A leather chest piece, boiled with oil and wax to harden it.

Items.Name: Steel Breastplate
Items.FlavorText: An extremely archaic and cumbersome piece of armor with lots of protection.

Items.Name: Spiked Plate
Items.FlavorText: A steel breastplate covered in vicious spikes.

Items.Name: Lead Plate
Items.FlavorText: A breastplate made of thick lead slabs. It will slow down one who wears it.

Items.Name: Makeshift Cloak
Items.FlavorText: A makeshift cloak made from scraps of a parachute.

Items.Name: Red Cloak
Items.FlavorText: A sturdy cloak that will keep the weather at bay. It has many pockets.

Items.Name: Rubber Tarp
Items.FlavorText: A tarp made completely of rubber. It can be worn for minor protection, but also to resist electrical attacks.

Items.Name: Stealth Cloak
Items.FlavorText: This cloak allows the wearer to become practically invisible to unfriendly eyes.

Items.Name: Leather Pack
Items.FlavorText: A backpack made of worn leather. It'll help with the load of loot you'll surely pick up on your travels.

Items.Name: Large Pack
Items.FlavorText: A large, encumbering backpack. It'll help with the load of loot you'll surely pick up on your travels.

Items.Name: Wool Scarf
Items.FlavorText: This scarf might keep the chill at bay, but the pattern on it sure is ugly...

Items.Name: Worn Cape
Items.FlavorText: A thin cape riddled with various holes.

Items.Name: Thick Cape
Items.FlavorText: A thick, warm cape. This will keep you dry in the rain, while also providing some defense.

Items.Name: Spine Protector
Items.FlavorText: Influenced by motor cycle protection. It surrounds the spine while allowing free movement via elastic segments.

Items.Name: Synthetic Shell
Items.FlavorText: A large dome-shaped piece of armor, designed to be strapped to your back. Very cumbersome.

Items.Name: Fireproof Blanket
Items.FlavorText: A fireproof blanet, offering resistance to heat when worn on the back like a cape.

Items.Name: Quiver
Items.FlavorText: A hide quiver used to quickly reload bow-type weapons.

Items.Name: Serpentine Armor
Items.FlavorText: Plates of metal designed to fit over a large tail. Mutants might require one of these.

Items.Name: Wing Covers
Items.FlavorText: Plastic and rubber plates set at the base of wings to protect them, while also maintaining menuverability.

Items.Name: Iodine Tablet
Items.FlavorText: A small pill that can cure radiation sickness.

Items.Name: Caffeine Pill
Items.FlavorText: For a quick pick-me-up. Causes haste and restores a little stamina.

Items.Name: Explosive
Items.FlavorText: Throw this item at enemies to turn them into a fine mist.

Items.Name: Bandage
Items.FlavorText: Strands of cloth, that when applied, can be ued to stop bleeding.

Items.Name: Surgeon's Kit
Items.FlavorText: Standard tools used by surgeons to amputate and replace limbs.

Items.Name: Return Pad
Items.FlavorText: A special device which allows the user to set a specific location, and return to it at will.

Items.Name: Ensis Return Pad
Items.FlavorText: A special device which allows the user to return to the Ensis Stronghold. It is pre-set.

Items.Name: Xul Return Pad
Items.FlavorText: A special device which allows the user to return to the Xul Camp. It is pre-set.

Items.Name: Mysterious Return Pad
Items.FlavorText: A special device which allows the user to return to a specific location. It is pre-set.

Items.Name: Home Return Pad
Items.FlavorText: A special device which allows the user to return to your Home Base. It is pre-set.

Items.Name: Blink Stone
Items.FlavorText: A special device that allows the user to teleport to a selected viewed area.

Items.Name: Shining Gem
Items.FlavorText: A mysterious gem that will bring you back to the surface of the planet.

Items.Name: <color=yellow>Prosthetic</color> Arm
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm, for those who have lost a limb.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Bionic</color> Arm
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm, for those who have lost a limb. This arm boasts superior strength.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Hydraulic</color> Arm
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm, for those who have lost a limb. This arm uses hydraulics, decreasing your dexterity while increasing your strength.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Living Stone</color> Arm
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm made of a sentient piece of stone.

Items.Name: <color=teal>Ensistic</color> Arm
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm, for those who have lost a limb. This arm boasts superior strength.

Items.Name: <color=olive>Peg</color> Leg
Items.FlavorText: A replacement leg, for those who have lost a limb. Better than nothing.

Items.Name: <color=olive>Hook</color> Hand
Items.FlavorText: A replacement arm with a hook at the end. Not very nimble, but it works.

Items.Name: <color=yellow>Prosthetic</color> Leg
Items.FlavorText: A simple replacement leg, for those who have lost a limb.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Bionic</color> Leg
Items.FlavorText: A replacement leg, for those who have lost a limb. You may even be faster with this than with a humn leg.

Items.Name: <color=silver>Living Stone</color> Leg
Items.FlavorText: A replacement leg made of a sentient piece of stone.

Items.Name: <color=teal>Ensistic</color> Leg
Items.FlavorText: A replacement leg, for those who have lost a limb. You may even be faster with this than with a human leg.

Items.Name: Jet Boot
Items.FlavorText: A powered boot that allow you to hover in the air for a limited period of time.

Items.Name: Frostborne Blade
Items.FlavorText: An un-melting blade made of pure cold. It is contained by some kind of magical energy.

Items.Name: Frostborne Dagger
Items.FlavorText: An un-melting knife made of pure cold. It is contained by some kind of magical energy.

Items.Name: Arc Lance
Items.FlavorText: A lance made of pure energy. Its length crackles with raw power.

Items.Name: Arc Blade
Items.FlavorText: A long, curved sword made purely of energy. Its blade grows with increased kinetic energy allowing large sweeping attacks.

Items.Name: Plasma Blade
Items.FlavorText: A long, curved blade made of superheated plasma. Immense heat radiates from the hilt.

Items.Name: Aizith Helmet
Items.FlavorText: The helmet of a powered armor set. It bears a fearsome visage.

Items.Name: Aizith Cape
Items.FlavorText: A cape that shields the wearer from various attacks, while rendering them nealy invisible while behind it.

Items.Name: Aizith Cuirass
Items.FlavorText: The chestpiece of a powered armor suit. Very heavy, but protects like nothing else.

Items.Name: Aizith Gauntlet
Items.FlavorText: An arm piece of a powered armor suit.

Items.Name: Aizith Boot
Items.FlavorText: A leg piece of a powered armor suit.

Items.Name: Mechanical Wings
Items.FlavorText: Mechanical wings with a back strap. Enables the wearer to fly.

Items.Name: Intrine Arm
Items.FlavorText: A mechanical arm.It floats in mid-air as to not impede your movements, granting increased strength and dexterity. It it moved by thought alone.

Items.Name: Intrine Head
Items.FlavorText: An additional mechanical head attached to the base of your neck. Grants you extra accuracy and intelligence.

Items.Name: Flask
Items.FlavorText: A glass flask, able to hold 1 unit of liquid.

Items.Name: Canteen
Items.FlavorText: A metal canteen. It is able to hold 2 units of liquid.

Items.Name: Jug
Items.FlavorText: A plastic jug. It is able to hold 4 units of liquid.

Items.Name: Xul Mod Kit
Items.FlavorText: A kit to outfit an item with the "Xul" modifier. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: Adrenal Mod Kit
Items.FlavorText: A kit to outfit an item with the "Adrenal" modifier. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: Runed Mod Kit
Items.FlavorText: A kit to outfit an item with the "Runed" modifier. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: Scalding Mod Kit
Items.FlavorText: A kit to outfit an item with the "Scalding" modifier. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: Frozen Mod Kit
Items.FlavorText: A kit to outfit an item with the "Frozen" modifier. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: Whetstone
Items.FlavorText: A stone that allows you to add the "Sharp" modifier to an item. Replaces all other mods.

Items.Name: AI Core
Items.FlavorText: A chip containing an AI. It needs a body to be able to interact with you.

Items.Name: Bottle Cap
Items.FlavorText: The cap off a bottle, though these haven't been used in decades. Can be traded for cybernetic enhancements.

Items.Name: Lesser Tome of Health
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Health
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Integrity
Items.FlavorText: An ancient tome contain a great secret.

Items.Name: Spirit Tome
Items.FlavorText: An ancient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Scritter Tome
Items.FlavorText: An ancient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Echo's Tome
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Fire
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Flames
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Hypothermia
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Icicle
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Lightning
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Escape
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Heat
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Toxin
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Radiation
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Confusion
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Haste
Items.FlavorText: An acient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Tome of Hallucination
Items.FlavorText: Who knows what secrets this book could contain?

Items.Name: Tome of Return
Items.FlavorText: An ancient tome containing a great secret.

Items.Name: Berserker's Manual
Items.FlavorText: A manual that teaches one to charge head-first into the fray.

Items.Name: Performer's Manual
Items.FlavorText: A manual that teaches one to be as nimble as a dancer.

Items.Name: Black Fang
Items.FlavorText: A large jet black axe. On it is an interpretive carving of a spider.

Items.Name: Sagacious Circlet
Items.FlavorText: A silver band. It glows faintly, radiating a protecive shield over those who wear it. Its healing ability further makes this item irreplacable.

Items.Name: Aizith Baton
Items.FlavorText: A lightning-fast energy baton capable of making several strikes in a row. It was created with the same technology that made energy shields.

Items.Name: Giant Mace
Items.FlavorText: An enormous mace, dwarfing any reasonable weapon. It is incredibly slow to swing, but can hit harder than anything else.

Items.Name: Man Cleaver
Items.FlavorText: A wicked scythe wielded once by the cannibal <color=magenta>Killower</color>. It has seen more human blood than any single weapon on Axu.

Items.Name: Ritual Dagger
Items.FlavorText: A strange-looking dagger with a handle made of polished stone. A blood-red jewel sits on its pommel.

Items.Name: Butcher's Knife
Items.FlavorText: A curved, serrated knife often used to cut flesh. Holding it gives ths wielder inspiration...

Items.Name: Staff of Xzol
Items.FlavorText: An intricately engraved staff carried by the prophet, <color=magenta>Isazna</color>. Its prescence lifts the wielder's mind into a higher plane.

Items.Name: Sword of Fate
Items.FlavorText: A curved sword crafted from metals native to the planet. It glows faintly, almost indistinguishable to the naked eye. <color=magenta>Lomis</color> wielded this blade.

Items.Name: Redeemer's Spear
Items.FlavorText: A spear smuggled to Axu by <color=magenta>Arthomas</color>. He wielded this spear in the hope of redeeming his ancestors' traitorous acts.

Items.Name: Saira's Rifle
Items.FlavorText: A sleek bolt-action rifle, suitable for long-ranged kills. It has the name "Saira" carved into the stock.

Items.Name: Smiter
Items.FlavorText: Once wielded by Uro-Ren the Pious, this greatmaul was used to smite the enemies of the Deep Ones.

Items.Name: Grum's Club
Items.FlavorText: A club belonging to a wild man. It is crude but sturdy, just like him. Big Smash.

Items.Name: Curious Artifact
Items.FlavorText: An ancient artifact. Akk-Lune said he needed it.

Items.Name: Keycard
Items.FlavorText: A magnetic keycard. What it opens is unknown.

Items.Name: Pulsating Artifact
Items.FlavorText: An ancient artifact. You cannot even grasp its purpose... Someone may need it.

Items.Name: Arid Artifact
Items.FlavorText: An ancient artifact. You cannot even grasp its purpose... Someone may need it.

Items.Name: Unknown Ore
Items.FlavorText: A chuck of ore. Its properties are unknown to you, but someone may have use for it.

Items.Name: Oromir's Artifact
Items.FlavorText: A cube of unknown metal. Its properties are unknown to you, but someone may have use for it.

Items.Name: Irradiated Heart
Items.FlavorText: Even after this heart was removed from its owner, it still steadily beats.

Items.Name: Animus Stone
Items.FlavorText: A glistening perfect sphere, made of a substance unknown to you.

Items.Name: Metal Plating
Items.FlavorText: Thick metal plates.

Items.Name: Chasis
Items.FlavorText: Thick metal plates.

Items.Name: Scrap Metal
Items.FlavorText: This used to be a working machine. What did you do? It might be worth something.

Items.Name: Fangs
Items.FlavorText: Wicked, curved teeth.

Items.Name: Fangs
Items.FlavorText: Wicked, curved teeth.

Items.Name: Sharp Fangs
Items.FlavorText: Wicked, curved teeth.

Items.Name: Concrete Fists
Items.FlavorText: Fists of hardened concrete.

Items.Name: Claws
Items.FlavorText: Protrusions capable of tearing flesh.

Items.Name: Blight
Items.FlavorText: A writhing mass of pitch blackness.

Items.Name: Talons
Items.FlavorText: Protrusions capable of tearing flesh.

Items.Name: Beak
Items.FlavorText: Your mouth is a bird-like beak.

Items.Name: Sharp Claws
Items.FlavorText: Extremely sharp and deadly claws.

Items.Name: Hooves
Items.FlavorText: Hooves

Items.Name: Wings
Items.FlavorText: Wings sprouting from your back.

Items.Name: Dorsal Fin
Items.FlavorText: A large shark-like fin sprouts from your back.

Items.Name: Shell
Items.FlavorText: A thick turtle-like shell.

Items.Name: Hide
Items.FlavorText: Thick skin.

Items.Name: Tendrils
Items.FlavorText: Thin translucent tendrils that protrude from your arms.

Items.Name: Tentacle
Items.FlavorText: A long, slime-covered tentacle sits in the place of your arm.

Items.Name: Corrupted Claw
Items.FlavorText: Corruption manifested in physical form. Your arm is a twisted mass of darkness.

Items.Name: Constricting Tail
Items.FlavorText: A long, strong tail built for squeezing the life out of foes.

Items.Name: Horns
Items.FlavorText: You do not want to be on the bad end of these things.

Items.Name: Large Horns
Items.FlavorText: You do not want to be on the bad end of these things.

Items.Name: Antennae
Items.FlavorText: Ugly bulbous entennae jutt out from the top of your skull.

Items.Name: Vines
Items.FlavorText: Whip-like vines used for ensaring and slicing foes.

Items.Name: Seed Pod
Items.FlavorText: A pod that is able to shoot seeds at high velocity.

Items.Name: Turret
Items.FlavorText: An automatic turret.

Items.Name: Bramble
Items.FlavorText: Thorny branches.

Items.Name: Flaming Palm
Items.FlavorText: A hand imbued with flame.

Items.Name: Venomous Ooze
Items.FlavorText: Thick slime.

Items.Name: Volcanic Ooze
Items.FlavorText: Thick slime.

Items.Name: Caustic Ooze
Items.FlavorText: Extremely corrosive liquid.

Items.Name: Frigid Ooze
Items.FlavorText: A thick, mucous-like liquid that chills to the bone.

Items.Name: Fist
Items.FlavorText: Nothing like bare knuckles to do the job cleanly.

Items.Name: Ghostly Tendrils
Items.FlavorText: A weapon wielded by a spectral spirit.

Items.Name: Spiny Legs
Items.FlavorText: Long legs made of some chitin-like material.

Items.Name: Hard Fist
Items.FlavorText: A clenched fist, tough as steel.

Items.Name: Arm Cannon
Items.FlavorText: A small firearm set above the wrist.

Items.Name: Stump
Items.FlavorText: Without a limb, all that is left is a sensitive stump.

Items.Name: Spiny Frond
Items.FlavorText: A frond from local fauna, covered in small, sharp spines. After removing the spines, the taste almost resembles celery from back home.

Items.Name: Poisonous Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The corpse of a creature. It doesn't look appetizing at all.

Items.Name: Irradiated Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The radioactive corpse of a fallen creature. Be cautious when eating this.

Items.Name: Sickly Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The corpse of a sick creature.

Items.Name: Vampiric Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The corpse of a vampiric creature.

Items.Name: Human Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The corpse of a fellow human. You wouldn't eat this, would you..?

Items.Name: Corpse
Items.FlavorText: The corpse of some creature.

Items.Name: Slime Heart
Items.FlavorText: The single internal organ in a slime. It looks poisonous.

Items.Name: Slime Jelly
Items.FlavorText: The excretion left by a rare species of slime. Highly nutritious, but not recommended for those used to fine dining.

Items.Name: Head
Items.FlavorText: A severed head, hopefully not yours. It could make a gruesome meal.

Items.Name: Arm
Items.FlavorText: Someone - or something's - severed arm. It could make a gruesome meal or an unnerving weapon.

Items.Name: Leg
Items.FlavorText: Someone - or something's - severed leg. It could make a gruesome meal or an unnerving weapon.

Items.Name: Tail
Items.FlavorText: A severed tail of some beast. It could make a gruesome meal or an unnerving weapon.

Items.Name: Wing
Items.FlavorText: A severed wing of some beast. It could make a gruesome meal.

Items.Name: Folding Blade
Items.FlavorText: Made of a strong yet flexible metal. This blade is grafted to your arm.

Items.Name: Hunter's Journal
Items.FlavorText: A dyed leather journal. Its cover is signed only "The Hunter".

Items.Name: Map
Items.FlavorText: A map with an interesting landmark marked with an '<color=red>X</color>'. Use it to reveal the location.
